training_quality_justification: High training value (9/10) due to comprehensive Pulumi Python implementation that delivers a production-ready IoT pipeline, enforces environment suffix naming, and demonstrates multi-service integration (IoT Core -> Kinesis -> Lambda -> DynamoDB/S3) with observability and least-privilege IAM patterns. The pairing MODEL_FAILURES.md highlights realistic shortcomings the model must avoid, providing clear contrast for learners.
author: mayanksethi-turing
